operator.title: Google Cloud Speech API
operator.synopsis: Convert audio to text by applying powerful neural network models. This operator opens an audio file and transcribes its content to text using the Google Cloud Speech API.

text.paragraph: To use the extension, go to https://console.cloud.google.com/ and click on Create project. Follow the instructions on the screen to create a new project.

Then go to your project dashboard. On the left, select APIs and Services and click on Dashboard. Click on Enable APIs and Services, search for Google Cloud Speech API, right-click on it, and click on Enable.

Go again to your project dashboard. On the left, select APIs and Services and click on Credentials. Click on Create credentials and select API key. Copy the API key and paste it in the API key parameter of the Google Cloud Speech API operator.
Enter the correct values for the remaining parameters of the operator and run the operator to transcribe an audio file of your choice.

outputPorts.port: ExampleSet containing a transcription of the audio file and the associated confidence.
